definition: to fish with a hook and bait
to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch
erhua variant of 釣鉤|钓钩[diao4 gou1]

sentences.english: Thus I caught two fishes as it were with one hook.
sentences.chinese: 這樣我像是用一隻釣鉤而捉住了兩條魚。
我們的釣鉤掛在一塊了。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a squid fishhook, in particular to a novel retractable squid fishhook design.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及魷釣鉤漁具，一種新型伸縮式魷釣鉤設計。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a squid fishhook, in particular to a novel retractable squid fishhook design.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及魷釣鉤漁具，一種新型伸縮式魷釣鉤設計。

sentences.english: She knows how to bait the hook to attract husbands for her daughters.
sentences.chinese: 她知道如何把餌裝在釣鉤上來爲女兒們吸引丈夫。
